Summary: Murrysville: Triangle-ish UFO w/probe caught on HD video!!!!! Alien research craft?
trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Murrysville
There was one other sighting in Murrysville on or around May 22nd 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsmurrysville, pa: i was still up around 4:00am... had been looking off and on all night for a 3rd return of the orange ufo we saw on 5\18\09 and 5\13\09.. was ready with my new, 2- day-old $1200 sony hdr-xr500v hd camcorder, celestron skymaster giant binoculars 20x80.......(still waiting for the tripod and telephoto lens). i thought, i may as well take another bathroom trip before turning in... when i came out, i thought, "why not take one last look?" saw a flashing something craft going kinda slow and low (only about an 1 inch over the treeline in front of my house). i thought... "what the hell is that?" opened the window to get a better look because i didn't have my glasses on... and no sound! i ran to the bar in living room to grab the new camcorder.. i wrestled frantically at the patio door lock, ran out onto the deck and filmed this thing! it was heading west approx., and was lost behind some large trees... ran to the bedroom at the west end of my house to see if it would come out of trees, but it didn't. you can hear on the video only some ambient highway noise and crickets, followed by me whispering "where'd it go?". before you think it's just a helicopter or plane, look how the torpedo thing on right side changes--the porthole\exhaust hole-looking things changes, doo-dads are seen on top in one photo.. and, look closely at ufoprobe39big.jpg... there's square windows lit up by the flashing light!..... oh yeah, and let's not forget about the little probe. didn't notice it too much at playback until i did the frame-by-frame... whizzes past the craft from the right to the left! in one blow up, it looks bullet shaped with 2 holes. these things have been seen by paul and i moving silently overhead for a couple of months now (the 5th one we noticed--wonder how many we didn't)... thought it was weird, but thought because of the flashing lights they were just some sort of plane... we're not plane buffs, but we'd never seen planes with 3 white lights on the back with a big red light underneath....the flashing lights where the wing tips should be are what throws you off. i think they've figured out how to pretend to be our planes so they can travel without hassle. except the no noise part... i had seen it earlier in the night with my giant binoculars, but it was too far away to see anything but the 2 lights on back and flashing (going at an angle, only 2 show). by the time i got a decent look and was heading right towards down the street thru the woods... only 35 seconds of video--but it is in blu-ray format! 1440 x 1080. (i'm a little bummed to realize today that i could've had a 12.1mp photo during recording if i had pressed the photo button....sigh). i'm soooooo excited!!!!!! we've seen many different kinds of unidentified flying objects (vertical rod, neon green & orange fireballs, red pulsating disk, star-like bright round ones, comet type horizontal flying one, huge cigar with probes, a neon green light orb in iowa, a v-shaped one, a smaller oblong silver one, and a small, softball-to-soccer ball-sized silver orb, but this one takes the cake!) go ahead, look at the video and blow ups and say it with me...."what the hell is it???!!" update: video presentation done with blown-up stills in slow-motion playback. video is untouched, stills only had 'sharpen' and\or brightness\contrast adjusted to see detail. posted on my youtube channel (plus enjoy my pre-screened "favorites" videos--all are impressive non-fake ones), at: www.youtube.com\seeingufospa oh yeah, i copyrighted all the images so i could possibly get compensated for my lack of sleep and equipment costs. it's only fair. all rights reserved and all that stuff....
